General.Name: Action Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Action Electronics Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale, maintenance, installation, and servicing of various household appliances; manufacturing, processing, and trading of automotive audio-visual electronic products; and warehousing and logistic services and asset development, etc. in Taiwan and internationally. It is also involved in housing and building development, rental, and real estate leasing and trading, etc. activities. In addition, the company offers consumer electronic products and accessories, portable multimedia products, and LCD TV products; manufactures and sells car LCD TVs; and provides plant and leasing services. Action Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 198, Zhongyuan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 320
